article.title: EF Johnson Technologies Awarded $48 Million Navy Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: EF Johnson Technologies Incorporated's 3e Technologies subsidiary has been awarded a $48 million contract from the U.S. Navy. This indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity, cost-plus-fixed-price contract calls for the company to design, test and implement a Navy-wide virtual perimeter monitoring system in support of the Navy's Commander, Naval Installations Command and the Transportation Security Administration.
